## CameraAnimation.start() method

Start the animation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract start(time?: number, onFinished?: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  time | number | Duration of the animation in milliseconds. |
|  onFinished | () =&gt; void | Callback that gets triggered once the animation ends. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
